name: anxdet-vscode
description: Research prototype VS Code extension that monitors coding metrics (keystrokes, pauses, errors, churn) to infer anxiety signals and deliver gentle, real‑time interventions. Designed for thesis experiments and dataset collection.

anxdet.windowSeconds.description: Size of the sliding time window (seconds) for feature aggregation.

anxdet.baselineWindows.description: Number of initial windows to use for per-user baseline calibration.

anxdet.scoreThreshold.description: Z-score weighted sum threshold for triggering an intervention.

anxdet.consecutiveWindows.description: Number of consecutive windows above threshold required to trigger a nudge.

anxdet.enableLogging.description: If true, metrics and labels are written to CSV in the extension storage folder.

anxdet.privacy.stripTextContent.description: Never log raw code or identifiers; only counts/timings.

anxdet.nudges.enableStatusBar.description: Show a small 'calm meter' in the status bar.

anxdet.nudges.enablePopup.description: Show gentle toast notifications when risk is elevated.

anxdet.model.weights.description: Weights for the simple linear risk model (normalized features).
